segments.text: hi , my name's Abby . What's your name ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm colin . It's nice to meet you . What do you do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm a freelance English teacher . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm in between jobs at the moment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: what kind of job are you looking for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to find a job with flexible hours in the IT field .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: have you ever thought about becoming a freelance IT consultant ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: no . Is it difficult to find such a job ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: not if you are good at net-working . Do you like to meet new people ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes . I'm pretty out-going and friendly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: do you have experience in the IT field ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have some . I worked in the IT department at a language school for four years in Spain .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: do you speak Spanish ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , but not fluently .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's OK . Have you sent your CV out to anyone yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've sent my CV to dozens of companies but nobody has got back to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: did you write a clear objective in your resume ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: no , because I didn't know what I wanted to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you need to update your CV . Bring it over to my office tomorrow and I'll help you with it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: thanks , I will . I'll see you tomorrow then !
segments.speaker: S2
